translations: 截（肢）（amputate 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: To save his life, doctors amputated his legs.
sentences.translation: 为了救他的命，医生们截去了他的双腿。

sentences.sentence: Gangrene set in and he had to have his leg amputated.
sentences.translation: 他的腿生了坏疽，必须截除。

sentences.sentence: He had to have both legs amputated.
